name: dohjs
description: Do DNS over HTTPS lookups from your browser

scripts.build: npm run dohjs && npm run doh-script
scripts.dohjs: browserify lib/index.js --standalone doh -o dist/doh.js && npx terser dist/doh.js --compress --mangle --output=dist/doh.min.js
scripts.doh-script: browserify lib/doh-script/doh-script-elem.js lib/doh-script/doh-script-helpers.js -o dist/doh-script.js && npx terser dist/doh-script.js --compress --mangle --output=dist/doh-script.min.js
